column5: I Just want to wish each and every OFC'er a very Merry Christmas and I hope that 2011 is a fantastic year for you all. Dad (Big Cliff) I hope you and Sue have a wonderful Christmas day. We will give you a call later in the day. I am crossing my fingers that at least 1 OFC'er has last nights lotto max number since I didn't.  Be Safe & Happy everyone.
